title: Is sugar (or salt, or fat) the biggest problem in our diets? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. sugar is not at all good for our health. We should minimize the use of sugar in our diet especially during this pandemic (covid-19) because it also weakens our immunity. During the manufacture of sugarcane, many chemicals and other things are added to it which indirectly harm us it is also the cause of diabetes. Instead of sugar u can also use jaggery or brown sugar which also gives sweetening flavour and are not much bad for our health.

Sugar is problem only. Fat and salt is essential for Homo sapiens (HUMAN). Fat is essential for your brain, sex hormones, cell membranes. Salt is essential for your proper body functions.
